main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on 11 January 1953 by a civilian airport manager in Gadsden, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, glowing, multi-colored mass that revolved rapidly., It was observed for approximately 5 to 10 minutes., The object was estimated to be about 30 to 40 feet in diameter., It emitted a bright light and was surrounded by a vapor trail., No physical evidence or photographs were obtained from the sighting.
witness description: Civilian Airport Manager and Civilian Air Defense Director
